website_summaries.verdict: Contemporary design that's versatile enough for any occasion.
pros: These get top marks for being very light
Comes in metal and rubber frame versions
cons: Actual colors were often not as expected from the images shown

customer_reviews.title: Do not order fake Ray-Ban
customer_reviews.text: By far the worst Amazon experience ever, came in the wrong style and colour. Glasses are beyond used. The lenses are scratched to the point where one can barely see through them, the frames are so rubbed and worn that most of the writing on the inside of the arms is worn off. The frames are stretched out and loose. Unbelievable. It makes me wonder what sort of method and protocol for selling repackaged products Amazon employs. It will be a while before I buy anything here again. Really disappointed with this product as would have returned it but have returned home from Indonesia would cost too much to do so
customer_reviews.author: IRENE NAPITUPULU

customer_reviews.title: Fake sunglasses! Don't buy it, after wearing a ...
customer_reviews.text: Fake sunglasses! Don't buy it,after wearing a lot the ray ban name just started to disepare ! If anyone got them recently just try to peel the name with your nails and will come off!
customer_reviews.author: Kt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Has the ray ban p etched on the lenses. And most definitely are polarized:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loving my new sunnies
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love these sunglasses they feel very comfortable and secure on my face. The color is pretty and I love the shape. I am 100% sure that these are genuine ray-bans. Like other reviewers have said they are a bit light though so if you are looking for really dark sunglasses go with something else. But, these are super cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Catalina C.

customer_reviews.title: Great and wont get stuck in your hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, they are just a little too big, but otherwise great. They look cool - but it is taking me a little longer to get used to how dark they are as I before that used brown gradient ones. One of the reasons I went for this model, was that I liked that it did not have the little separate nose-duds! - so I can slide them up on top of my head without the sunglasses getting stuck in my hair!
customer_reviews.author: Cat S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that the color doesn’t match the photo
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the color doesn’t match the photo, mine are definitely more of a purple color. Have no time to return i leave for vacation tomorrow. Same glasses as the photo jut not the same “sand” color described.
customer_reviews.author: namepen

customer_reviews.title: Small for wider face, light lenses (too much sun gets in)
customer_reviews.text: Very light. Comfy on face. If you have a little extra weight or have a round face probably not your shade. I took a poll on Snapchat and everyone said go bigger. I’m maybe 25 lbs overweight and they just look small on my face. Shade is a bit too light also. Ultimately I returned this product.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Newton

customer_reviews.title: Mirror Ones Scratch Easy!
customer_reviews.text: These scratch super easy with the reflective for the price. My daughter had them one week and she wanted new ones due to the scratch--I told her to use her own money if she wanted another and she will hopefully be more careful with them. I have Ray Bans and mine aren't scratched after 5 years, but mine aren't reflective. The scratch is visible.
customer_reviews.author: AZC

customer_reviews.title: Happy Eyes
customer_reviews.text: I am sticking to this brand forever. Its so handy, comfy and light to wear. Doesn't keep slipping on my nose like others did. Needless to mention blocks the eye burning sun rays of Texas. Totally worth spending the money. I now get the hype about it :)
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pair of glasses- especially for small faces
customer_reviews.text: These sun glasses are sharp. I have a pretty small, dainty face so it is hard to find a good pair. I did a lot of shopping around to find the style and size I wanted. No regrets over here. The are a little loose when I have them on top of my head but they only fall off if I am moving my head in big motions (side-to-side; front-to-back stretching my neck). I love these, worth every penny. My mom bought a pair as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Case is cheap But the glasses are nice! Genuine product!
customer_reviews.text: Comes with a ray ban case..... but the felt comes off and leaves little tiny hits all over the glasses and lenses. Worried that will scratch the lenses when cleaning- there is A LOT. Other than the case, I’d say good value for the $ considering the cost from anywhere else. They’re definitely genuine product!
customer_reviews.author: Siena

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Erika authentic RBs!  LOVE 'EM
customer_reviews.text: Just received these!! LOVE THEM! Exactly what I had hoped for. The item number is correct, but they are Erika style, not Aviator as the short description depicts. Amazon, you should change that. They are tortoise, with brown gradient lens, and definitely polarized. Both the lenses are etched with Ray Ban P on the right one, and RB on left, in RB box, case and cloth. I would grab these!!! A very happy customer! Patti B., Chicago
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A.

customer_reviews.title: Glasses were in horrible condition
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Christmas present for my girlfriend (supposedly brand new). Lenses were so scratched, it looked like they were kept in a bag of rocks. What a disappointment/embarrassment to give such a sub-par gift.
customer_reviews.author: richardboore

customer_reviews.title: Super Stylish but not a Fan
customer_reviews.text: I tried these on through prime wardrobe. They were cute but they kept sliding off my face and sat heavy on my nose. I just felt like I had to keep adjusting them. I ended up sending them back. I think I'll stick with styles that have the nose pads. Super duper cute though. I wish they weren't so uncomfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Angieknowsthetruth

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Nice shades, and look great. They were shipped quickly and came in great condition - with a case! They are VERY light weight and tend to fit a little closer to my fat cheeks than I like.. but they are great for keeping the Arizona sun at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Janice S.

customer_reviews.title: Stylishly and Light
customer_reviews.text: These have metal ear pieces which makes them very light weight. I use them everyday. I was hesitant in purchasing as I like a dark tint but these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel McGoff

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses, excellent vision and function in the sun
customer_reviews.text: These woman's sunglasses are beautiful. Tortoise shell frame, light wire arms, and luxurious Rayban polarized lenses. They are expensive, but they are beautiful, and most important, they provide excellent vision and function in the sun.
customer_reviews.author: J. Blackwood

customer_reviews.title: Really nice glasses
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves them. All Rayban original, comes with the standard case and cleaning clothe. Color is really nice, I was expecting lenses to be darker/mirrory, but it’s ok.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Buy Them
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are the metallic silver with silver frames. I expected them to be a bit brighter in color, however, I am pleasantly surprised. Absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Very Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for a nicer, stylish pair to replace pair of sunglasses I've had for awhile. It was hard to find something I liked when I put them on, something that didn't put too much pressure over my ears. These fit perfect and are great quality! They are lightweight and fit a little looser over the ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking eyewear
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my teenage daughter and she loves them. They seem legit and I am 100% satisfied on the price I paid for Ray Bans that I couldn't find cheaper anywhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome quality! I really didn't know what to expect sence these are my first rayban. I went to the mall where I live, not far from Chattanooga Tn. Shopping for a pair and price checking, the price was a little over the top! I'm so happy that I was able to find them on Amazon for far less than the well know sun glass place!! For the very same style and color!! Identical to the ones in the high end store!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: unique and comfortable sunglasses, I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: These are the MOST fashionable, unique and comfortable sunglasses, I've ever purchased. I bought these because they have wayfarer frames, aviator ear grips, a unique sandy color and finally, no nose grips that get caught in the hair if one lifts their sunglasses on their head when walking into a building or shaded area. I am very, very, very satisfied!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Dieck

Deceitful sale of regular lenses sold as polarized. Buyer beware.

product_meta.title: Ray-Ban Women's Rb4171 Erika Round Sunglasses
product_meta.description:
Ray-Ban Erika sunglasses are fashion-forward and stylish sunglasses for women and men. Featuring round pilot lenses, these Oversized Round sunglasses are the perfect must-have accessory to complete a trendy appearance. Erika RB4171 sunglasses feature prescription-ready (Rx-able) plastic lenses that are treated with a 100% UV protective coating.

Ray-Ban Erika RB4171 sunglasses available in a variety of colors and lenses include polarized, gradient and solid lenses making these sunglasses ideal for both sunny and hazy days. These Ray-Ban unisex sunglasses include a 100% nylon frame. The bridge measures 18 mm, and the arms measure 145 mm. These sunglasses also feature a lens width of 54 mm.

Ray-Ban is the world’s most iconic eyewear brand and is a global leader in its sector. Every model in the Ray-Ban collection is the product of meticulous, original styling that translates the best of the latest fashion trends into an ever-contemporary look for millions of Ray-Ban wearers around the world. From the early Aviator style that emerged in 1937 to the introduction of the classic Wayfarer in 1952, Ray-Ban is a brand that embodies America, adventure, great cities, wide-open spaces, heroism, individuality, and authenticity.
feature_bullets: UNISEX OVERSIZED ROUND SUNGLASSES: Ray-Ban RB4171 Erika Oversized Round Sunglasses feature lenses that are prescription-ready, 100% UV protected, and fashionable for both women and men.

100% UV PROTECTION: To protect your eyes from harmful UV rays, these sunglasses include plastic lenses that are coated with 100% UV protection. Lenses measure 54 mm wide, and they are durable and non-polarized.

DURABLE NYLON FRAMES: Ray-Ban Erika sunglasses are exceptionally durable. The frame is made from lightweight and durable nylon. The bridge measures 18 mm, and the arms are 145 mm for an easy, comfortable fit.
LIGHTWEIGHT LENSES: These Ray-Ban sunglasses feature high-quality, light-weight lenses that help reduce eye strain while outdoors.
MULTIPLE FRAME AND LENS COLORS: Choose from multiple frame colors—including black and tortoise—and multiple lens colors and treatment—including polarized, gradient, mirrored and solid lenses.
PRESCRIPTION-READY LENSES: Ray-Ban RB4171 Erika sunglasses are perfect for those who require prescription sunglasses. Our lenses are made from prescription-ready materials
